document.full_text: republicans in the u.s. congress are launching a fresh attack on the healthcare law by targeting grants to states for creating insurance exchanges, just as congressional budget analysts said on thursday setting up the marketplaces may be delayed.
document.title: republicans target state health insurance exchange funds
lines_and_colors: republicans in the u.s. congress are launching a fresh attack on the healthcare law by targeting grants to states for creating insurance exchanges, just as congressional budget analysts said on thursday setting up the marketplaces may be delayed.
